text: Goodou guu hele gi daha nia waa laagau o Lebanon, gei dolomeenei, go goodou ala gaa hele gi daha. Goodou gu daaligi nia manu o di gowaa deelaa, gei dolomeenei nia manu ga hagamadagudagu goodou. Nia mee aanei la gaa hai, idimaa, goodou gu daaligi godou daangada gii mmade, gei goodou gu haga huaidu digau henuailala mo nadau waahale.
